name: Memory of Fall
description:
Life is a little tough right now, isn't it? Between the stress and the seeming never ending string of things going wrong, it can be very, very easy to feel the need to escape. 

This is a memory of fall. That is to say, it is fall as you remember it. The cool air, the wind blowing, jack-o-lanterns and falling leaves. Take a second, go for a walk, discover hidden secrets, escape and lose yourself in another place, however briefly. 

Controls -

WASD to move

Left-Click or E to interact

Credits:

Art/Programming: Josh Wilson

Voice Acting: Xathien

If you find the secret, please come visit me on discord or twitter and let me know!
